title: Statement of Purpose â€“ Computer Science
content:
My fascination with computing began when I built my first program at 15. This early interest evolved into a passion for solving complex problems through technology.

During my undergraduate studies, I developed a machine learning algorithm that improved traffic pattern prediction by 27%, sparking my interest in AI applications.

I aim to pursue graduate studies in Computer Science at [University Name] to deepen my understanding of artificial intelligence and its ethical implications. The pioneering research by Professor [Name] in sustainable AI aligns perfectly with my goal of developing technology that serves humanity while minimizing environmental impact.
